title: Живой среди чужих
overview: An animated sitcom about the life of a family of zombies and the last living guy on Earth. The classic situation: the protagonist comes to get acquainted with the parents of his girlfriend and does not immediately like her pumped up father-scientist. But the situation is saved by a zombie apocalypse. The survivor stays with the girl at home with her zombie family. However, the father still does not mind biting off his head, but, as a scientist, cannot destroy the only carrier of antibodies to the zombie virus.
